values:
<B>

R O A D T R I P ! ! ! ! !

me&jeremy have scheduled a road trip and WE"RE SO EXCITED!


juuuusssttt the two offff usss!

<center>

i love my hair.
orientation for work is tuesday.
buying reeboks tonight. Yay.
i love my boyfriend more than life itself.
and i miss my mom.


THE fucking end.

<center>

just got home from michelle's & taking jerm to work. god i love him. we've been picking on eachother too much lately, im kind of excited to start work so that the picking stops. ya know? i mean i see him everynight. everyday. sometimes twice a day at diff. times. and it leaves no time to miss him.. and maybe thats what i need. i dont know. but i love him SO fucking much, but we both getmoody sometimes which results in bickering. but hey, thats natural right?

anyWAY.. jeremy's family is in town. theyre so.. nice. i love his little cousin raychelle. she calls herself my sister, and nikki tells everyone im her sister in law. how cute is that.

OMFG.  i am buying roller skates. ive been rollerblading with nikki alot lately, lol and jeremy & brandon following us on their skate boards and its so much fucking fun. so ive decided that im getting the hot pink skechers rollerSKATES .. just to be old school. oh yeah.


so i really love my hair. i think it lightens up face.. and it really makes my tan noticable which is totally awesome. so yeah. i need to study, ands do my study guide for lit. yeah but im lazy.. and i feel like im going to take a NAP! hooray for me.

alright. this is enough. the most ive updated in like. a year.
kbye

got my done & so i took my cam over to his house & we had a party with it. hahahah. ^^ haha his face looks soo funny. ^ what the hell? ^weird... ^ he tickled me in the process of this picture.... ain't we cute.! ♥ my dabey ♥ I LOVE HIM
so i dyed my hair. before.. ..after.. ( i don't feel like using a cut... ) ITS WAY BLONDER IN PERSON. LIke WAY blonder. the flash i think just fudged it all up. so yeah. what do you think?

GUESS who got a job.
yeah. ME.

i will either be working at albertson's or smoothie king

i was all set on working at albertsons, made arrangements to sign the papers and such, just then smoothie king called me for an interview.

so, depending on what happens at this interview, ill make my desicion.

+ im still waiting for souper salad to call me back.

&HOPEFULLY.
they will.


but yeah. go meeeee.



this is all.

HELLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO i get blonde hair next friday. yes, hip hip horray. WHO WANTS TO SEE!! (how im dyeing it...) like that. thats me like last year. & heres a pic of a diff. girl with kind of the same hair whoo weeee. so from to sara and i are tizzight. cause we are TUFFx . alright goodbye lame hos.

<center>

yeah, had fun today with sara rye romeo & his friend tim. went shopping, i bought sunglasses.

i missed you sara.

im about to go with jeremy to see mean girls, im excited.

then im going to see elmo tomarrow!! YEAH BABY.

aiight bye.


♥ mellyissa


ps.

I LOVE MY DABEY!!
i want that tattoo, on the back of my neckkkkkkkkkk OR right ab ove my butt. (The small of my..BUTT.) hahha

<center>

i spent so much fucking money this weekend and its never felt soo good.



awesome.


i love my boyfriend.
i miss my boyfriend.
god, i wish he had the weekends off so i could see him all day.
:| heh, anyway.
its almost been 10months of me&jerm.
yeah we're perfect

gooddddbye

<center><B>

i swallow hard.
because i know,
what comes next will hurt.

<center>
<b>

dear mommy, 
i miss you so much you couldnt and wouldnt believe it. every night i fall asleep and awake with the thought and image of you in my head, and your nightgown wrapped tightly in my fist. i love you forever, and fucking always. 
<3 love,
your daughter


365 days ago.
exactly one year ago.
my life as well as hers came to an end.




heres the entry i wrote from last year, this exact day, after she died;

5:45am. my life as well as hers is over. my heart is gone. my soul is torn away. i cant explain how this feels. if i could take my emotional pain away and be with her i would. i cant stand it. she died. gone. in the blink of an eye. we got a call. confirmation. we went down there. oh god. going in that fucking room hurt like hell. holding her lifeless stiff hand feeling no pulse and no response. hurt like hell.kissing her breathless lips hurt like hell. feeling her cold clamy skin hurt like hell. not seeing her chest rise and fall. hurt like hell. saying goodbye for the very last time hurt like hell. the pain is immeasurable you guys could never imagine. picking out a fucking urn for your own mother is fucking horrible. i swear if my life gets any worse im going to go insane. what am i talking about? i probaly already am insane. all this.. has offically made me; insane. for ever and day ill love and miss her. nothing left to loose here i live my life to the best of my ability. sincere; goodbye.





<b>fuck it. its over.

<center>

HBUAHA.
jeremy just left, we painted tonight.
came out great as usuall.
Mhmm i made him dinner cause im a nice girlfriend like that.
& it was delish.
tomarrow my grandma comes back and i am dreading that.
and i love jeremy.
and hopefully this job thing goes through.
pray to the.. g o d if there is one.
i love jeremy & this concludes my entry.

family time, easter time. joy.
its all happening riiight now and yeah. boreddd.
i got to hide jeremy's easter basket in like an hour! im so excited!! i got him a bunch of things in his basket. wanna know?! okay.
1. old spice high endurance body wash.
2. gillette mach3 razor blades.
3. 2 pairs boxer briefs.
4. a huge bag of penut m&ms
5.dolce & gabbanna sunglasses
6.3packs of gum

and that is all. im excited cause its so cute! awh yeah. i'd post a pic but i really don't feel like it. Hm yeah.

so i seriously hate this girl. every thought of her makes me sick and i want to vomit out her face and then put it back on cause she is ugly and it looks like that anyways. and she can go to hell and rott cause shes rude  and a bitch and deserves the ultimate death.

WHEW. so yeah. jeremy needs to hurry up now. 

omfg.  i loveeeeeeee my new eyebrows. theyre so sexy.
i like them cause theyre still skinny, but fuller, and now i use powder so it looks more natural, and they are thicker in the front of it and then get skinnier at the end and arch up. yeah , i posted a pic down there but you cant really see it that well.
Mhmm.

20$ to get my upperlip waxed and my eyebrows shaped&waxed. best 20 dollars ive spent in a LONNGG time. yes.

i seriously love jeremy
like everything about him.

OH YEAH. he almost got an apartment but it was hella ghetto and yeah. i told him i'd be scared to go see him  and  yeah so he said no. and now hes going to finish his classes, and get a new job. and then like hella save. cause its hard to save alot of money now working at the job he has now. 
andpasihjskjd anyway!!!


hahaH my nephew, (hes 2) is singing the song on that commericial..

need a car? truck or van.. who you gonna call!?
CALL DESERT.

haha hes singing that advertisment. and im laughing and happy, and whoew.

we had a huge fucking dinner and now im stuffed. i saved jeremy like the huggest plate of leftovers in the world. yeah

im such a fucking awesome girlfriend.
go me.


<3♥

Well its been awhile since ive updated this thing. Umm my spring break is going good. monday was nikki's birthday party, ill upload pics later! tuesday instead of going to those shows we went a saw my dad and ate lunch on the strip .. then back to jeremy's and watched Thirteen. (that movie... my god...) and weds. my grand ma came into town and she is already cleaning. weds, me and jeremy went to dinner at the monte carlo, then went and saw "O" at bellagio, then went to the sirens show at TI. it was good. after the O show we got like a backstage pass and saw how everything worked and what not. it was awesome. i had a lot of fun.

tonight is jeremy's class, im kind of excited. haha. i like going to those things with him. and then tomarrow we're coloring easter eggs. hah. 

so yeeah our whole living room is completely rearranged yet again.
i slept in unil 11:45 today for the first time since like last summer.
im so fucking cool! i had to make myself sleep buahaha.

anyway, the new pic <|-- over there, the b utterfly one, means alot to me. i made it from the pics we took at bellagio, and made it to anf for my mommy.

its almost april 28.. one year......   :[ sad.


alright bye. i gotta call my sister

some one make my journal layout pimp
comment here if you'll do it for me

♥Mel and ♥Jerm

  • Can't wait to almost elope when the time is right.
  • Are metaphorically attached at the hip.

people and chose to believe me or not, whatever.

im done now.

1.im not a fucking on call babysitter. 2.im having a bad day. 3. today is the day (1yearago) we found out my mom was dieing. 4.i think jeremy is mad at me cause im in a bad mood and im being a brat but i cant help it but i am trying to help it but its hard. 5.i have a migraine, and dont have anything but percocets and nasal spray but i dont want to use a nasal spray cause i only have 6. 6.i just go tinvited to a slumber party at GK's. 7.i wouldnt be caught dead there. 8.i feel disgusting. 9.my sister is mad at me and i hate that cause i always love her even when im mad. 10.i need a new cell phone cause mine is a peice of shit. 11.i want jeremy to be here right now and hug me and tell me its okay if im a brat cause i have the right circumstances. 12.i just want jeremy. 13.....and my mommy. just.. you know what.. fuck you all.

news flash, melissa: youre absent too much. ..but its okay, today, cause you have a valid excuse. just dont let it happen again. have a nice day. sincere, the voice inside your head. so, im taking up painting. im not quite sure how to do so, or how to start.. so i guess im just going to wing it until HOPEFULLY i get painting 1 next year. yeah, i picked my classes. ill have 4 classes (most likely) me and jeremy just got done watching the movie "wrong turn". its good, scary, but good. completely predictable though, me and jerm knew the movie ending with only seeing it halfway through. hm, my dads playing poker right now. i hope hes winning. im getting tan. that makes me happy. this is what i got jeremy for valentines day. inside the pink wrapping is 5 boxes of 2.lbs of hot tamales, and inside the bag is 2 books hes been wanting. & those are cookie cakes. and yeah, thats a giant card. im cool. the end. soo i have to get a ct scan on march 8. wish me luck. hope fully nothing will be wrong with me.. hopefully. i'll leave you with a few pictures, that i dont like too much, i look gross and thats that. and im lazy and dont want to do a cut. but i guess i will anyways cause im cool. i look gross, i know. but i like the way my eyes and eye shadow looks under HIGH HIGH contrast. yeah, goodbye now.
